title: 2012-2013 Patch (v1.4.5) for FIFA 11 (FINAL 2012-13)
description:
2012-2013 Patch (v1.4.5) for FIFA 11

Contains:
- update Tool FIFA 11 Selector (1.0.2.0):
* Select database New extra options (add extra databases, change names, ...)
* Select Intro-movie New extra options
* Gameplay enable/disable new gameplay settings
* New Commentary enable/disable New English commentary
* Improvements, fixes, ...

- squads:
* Summer transfers (2013 - 14) updated transfers & team promotions/relegations
* fix wrong skills & details to some players
* fix stadium-links for new stadiums (offline version)

- New gameplay (from fifa online 3):
* Personality+ (attributes) unique skills, behaviours, ... for specific players
* AI improvement for teammates & opponents
* New cutscenes: start game, celebrations, substitution, ...
(disabled by default)

- New English Commentary (from fifa online 3):
(enabled by default)

- fix: green referee kit (offline version)

- Dutch (ingame) language: 
* position name 'left/right back' (LV/RV) renamed to (LB/RB) 
(to see difference 'left/right back' & 'left/right winger' (both LV/RV))

- New faces & hairs (updates to new season (new haircuts, ...)):
* Zaha Wilfried
* Moses Victor (update)
* BÃƒÂ¼ttner Alexander
* Ghilas Nabil
* De Gea (update)
* Cerci Alessio
* Felipe Santana (update)
* Cheyrou
* van Ginkel Marco
* Casillas (update)
* Illarramendi
* Isco
* carvajal
* Starke Tom
* Schweinsteiger (update)
* Gomez Mario (update)
* MandÃ…Â¾ukic (update)

* Lodeiro NicolÃƒÂ¡s

* Aubameyang Pierre-Emerick
* van persie (update)
* Neymar (update)
* Boateng Kevin-Prince (update)
* ... 

- 200 New mini-faces



 VERSION 1.4.4 NEEDED

Supported languages english, Czech, dutch, french, german, hungary, italian, spanish (2X), portuguese, polish, russian

Installation:
1. extract the data from the archive
2. copy to FIFA 11 folder (...FIFA 11 )
3. ENJOY!


Activate New gameplay/New English Commentary:
* open Tool FIFA 11 Selector.exe
* select your settings 
* & apply
(located at ...fifa 11)



Notes:
- You need to have FIFA 11 patch 1.01 (from ea) installed
- Some new players that are being added may have small problems with their name when you play online
- "OFFLINE Version" can work online, if others have this patch too


Problems:
- crashes, ...: use the "fifa 11 regenerator" (select "take care of edited files..." > go  , can take some time)
- still problems? --> go to my forum for more help



pls leave your comments if there are any problems
